reviewText: If you Like The new Adventures Kimba the White Lion as a kid you are surely going to love this VHS :) I haven't seen the last two yet but I'm hoping that they will come on Amazon really soon!!!!! I enjoy the VHS so much, and I'm thinking of getting another Kimba the White Lion VHS when Amazon puts them on the site :)

I LOVE this movie! It's the only Kimba movie I saw but it's GREAT! I am getting it for christmas and I LOVE on how Kimba is a white lion and how he cares for all animals!

  Do buy it!
